title: What are some popular music videos made with GoPro? - Quora

response.answer_text: Two indie artists Matt and Kim uploaded a video called Let’s Run Away, they simply used what they had. No big fancy cameras or crew, just themselves, a coat hangar, some wire and a GoPro. These two always do the most unique methods for their music videos, that’s why I like them so much. So, a fin is added to one side of the hanger, turning it into a sort of “tail”, which keeps it smooth and level while spinning. Doing an initial test we realized the more movement and energy was in the shot the better it would look. We shot a little of Kim dancing as she normally would and it just fell flat. She is dancing so aggressively in the shots that ended up in the video, she’s basically moshing with herself. – Matt Johnson

7/11 by Beyonce was shot with a GoPro camera. Beyonce has described it as an ode to goofing around and having fun with her friends, hence her choice to film the video using a GoPro instead of a more professional camera.
